description: Detects a whoami.exe executed by LOCAL SYSTEM. This may be a sign of a successful local privilege escalation. Author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov, Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Possible name overlap with NT AUHTORITY substring to cover all languages
name: Run Whoami as SYSTEM
